documentation.text: Events
Storage
@dev Associate a cloth type to its evaluation price defined in RGC token amount.
@dev Associate a unique id to a specific box.
@dev Associate a unique box id to a list of second-hand clothes (i.e., contained in the box).
@dev Associate a unique saleable cloth id to its data.
@dev Strict condition which evaluates true only if the sender is the public Reclothes Dealer.
@dev Strict condition which evaluates true only if the sender is a recycler.
@dev Strict condition which evaluates true only if the given id is greater than zero and if is not associated to a previously created box.
@dev Strict condition which evaluates true only if the given id is greater than zero and if is not associated to a previously available cloth.
@dev Strict condition which evaluates true only if the given id is associated to a previously created box.

documentation.text:
@notice Buy an saleable cloth using RSC tokens.
 @param _clothId The unique id which identifies the available cloth.

devdoc.author: LINKS Foundation

params._clothId: The unique id which identifies the available cloth.

params._confidentialPricingList: A list of evaluation prices for old clothes types.
params._reclothesShopAddress: The address of the ReclothesShop smart contract.
params._regenerationCreditAddress: The address of the RegenerationCredit smart contract.
params._resellingCreditAddress: The address of the ResellingCredit smart contract.

evaluateBox(uint256,uint256).details: This method needs that the recycler gives an amount of RGC tokens allowance to the contract itself.

params._boxId: The unique id which identifies the box.
params._extraAmountRGC: An extra amount of RGC tokens ad additional reward for the Reclothes Dealer.

sellUpcycledCloth(uint256,uint256,uint8,.details: This method create a new upcycled cloth from Recycler perspective and it can be purchased from Reclothes Dealer.

params._clothId: The unique id which identifies the cloth.
params._clothSize: The size of the cloth to put on sale.
params._clothType: The type of the cloth to put on sale.
params._description: A short description of the cloth.
params._extClothDataHash: A hash of the external data related to the cloth.
params._rscPrice: The price expressed as an amount of RSC.

params._boxId: The unique id which identifies the box.
params._clothesTypes: A list indicating the types of clothes inside the box.
params._description: A short description of the box.
params._quantities: A list indicating the quantities of clothes for each type inside the box.

boxToSecondHandClothes.details: Associate a unique box id to a list of second-hand clothes (i.e., contained in the box).

confidentialClothTypeToEvaluationPrice.details: Associate a cloth type to its evaluation price defined in RGC token amount.

idToBox.details: Associate a unique id to a specific box.

idToSaleableCloth.details: Associate a unique saleable cloth id to its data.

devdoc.title: The Reclothes Shop core and private business logic.

buyCloth(uint256).notice: Buy an saleable cloth using RSC tokens.

methods.constructor: Deploy a new Private Reclothes Shop smart contract for confidential interactions between Recycler and Reclothes Dealer.

evaluateBox(uint256,uint256).notice: Evaluate a box of second-hand clothes and remunerate with RGC tokens the box sender.

sellUpcycledCloth(uint256,uint256,uint8,.notice: Sell a new upcycled cloth purchasable from the Reclothes Dealer.

sendBoxForEvaluation(uint256,string,uint.notice: Send a box of second-hand clothes from customer to dealer.

userdoc.notice: This contract enables Recyclers and Reclothes Dealer to transact and cooperate on buy/sell upcycled clothes.This contract guarantee the confidential transactions between Recyclers and Reclothes Dealer.
